A Hot Module Replacement (HMR) feature for angular 2 app using vanilla angular CLI

Route-er

A package that enables you to decouple your routes from controllers and organise all routes in a single place for your express.js app

An electron + ionic app which allows you to control mouse remotely using your phone

Codex

A multi framework convertor that converts React.js code to Angular

Advanced node logger

A nodejs Logger plugin, which gives option to write logs to 3 different destinations, to console, to a file and a mongo database
